## NFL Elo

```{python}
import pandas as pd

games = (pd.read_csv("nfl_latest_elo.csv")
         .query("season == 2024")
         .assign(actual_spread = lambda x: (x["away_score"] -
                                            x["home_score"]))
         .filter(items=["week",
                        "away_team",
                        "away_elo",
                        "away_win_prob",
                        "away_score",
                        "home_team",
                        "home_elo",
                        "home_win_prob",
                        "home_score",
                        "point_spread",
                        "actual_spread"]))


print(games.style.format({
    "away_elo": "{:.0f}",
    "away_win_prob": "{:.0%}",
    "away_score": "{:.0f}",
    "home_elo": "{:.0f}",
    "home_win_prob": "{:.0%}",
    "home_score": "{:.0f}",
    "point_spread": "{:.0f}",
    "actual_spread": "{:.0f}",
}).to_string())
```
